fr.escape.game.entity.ships

Class AbstractShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.game.entity.ships.AbstractShip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collisionable, Drawable, Entity, Moveable, Ship, Updateable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBoss

    public abstract class AbstractShip
extends java.lang.Object
implements Ship
    This class provide a skeletal implementation of any Ship in the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractShip

        public AbstractShip(BodyDef bodyDef,
            FixtureDef fixture,
            java.util.List<Weapon> weapons,
            int life,
            EntityContainer container,
            AnimationTexture textures,
            CollisionBehavior collisionBehavior)
        AbstractShip Constructor
        Parameters:
        bodyDef - : The body definition for the JBox2D Object.
        fixture - : Fixture linked to the JBox2D Body.
        weapons - : List of Weapon usable by an AbstractShip.
        life - : Initial life of the AbstractShip.
        container - : EntityContainer in witch the AbstractShip is contained.
        textures - : Texture use for the AbstractShip.
        collisionBehavior - : Behavior used by this AbstractShip to manage JBox2D Collisions.

      • moveBy

        public void moveBy(float[] velocity)
        Description copied from interface: Moveable

        Apply a velocity to this Entity.

        Velocity is an array with the given properties:

        velocity[0] : Duration of the movement.
        velocity[1] : Force to apply on X.
        velocity[2] : Force to apply on Y.
        velocity[3] (optional) : Use to detect a looping.

        Specified by:
        moveBy in interface Moveable
